description: Provides details about a dimension that is defined in your Amazon Web Services accounts. Requires permission to access the DescribeDimension action.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the dimension.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the dimension.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the dimension.

nested_items.name: stringValues
nested_items.description: The value or list of values used to scope the dimension. For example, for topic filters, this is the pattern used to match the MQTT topic name.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date the dimension was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date the dimension was last modified.
